Name: ice
Description: Turns the highest dice rolled into a 1.

Name: ice_all
Description: Turns the highest dice rolled into a 1.

Name: fire
Description: Sets the next dice on fire. Costs [heart]2[] hp to extinguish.

Name: fire_all
Description: Sets the next dice on fire. Costs [heart]2[] hp to extinguish.

Name: shock
Description: Temporarily disables random equipment.|Can use a dice to unshock.

Name: weaken
Description: Temporarily weakens random equipment.|Equipment becomes less powerful.

Name: silence
Description: Cannot use special character skills or limit breaks.

Name: dodge
Description: Avoid the next attack.

Name: blind
Description: Cannot see the dice values.

Name: poison
Description: Lose [heart]<value> health at the start of turn. Pierces shields.

Name: fury
Description: The next equipment will be used twice.

Name: reequipnext
Description: The next equipment you use can be used again on this turn.

Name: reduce
Description: Take less damage from every attack this turn.

Name: lock
Description: Cannot use dice.

Name: dice_trigger_1
Description: Roll an extra dice next turn if the enemy rolls a 1.

Name: dice_trigger_2
Description: Roll an extra dice next turn if the enemy rolls a 2.

Name: dice_trigger_3
Description: Roll an extra dice next turn if the enemy rolls a 3.

Name: dice_trigger_4
Description: Roll an extra dice next turn if the enemy rolls a 4.

Name: dice_trigger_5
Description: Roll an extra dice next turn if the enemy rolls a 5.

Name: dice_trigger_6
Description: Roll an extra dice next turn if the enemy rolls a 6.

Name: counter_1
Description: All enemy dice that roll 1 are locked.

Name: counter_2
Description: All enemy dice that roll 2 are locked.

Name: counter_3
Description: All enemy dice that roll 3 are locked.

Name: counter_4
Description: All enemy dice that roll 4 are locked.

Name: counter_5
Description: All enemy dice that roll 5 are locked.

Name: counter_6
Description: All enemy dice that roll 6 are locked.

Name: recycle
Description: All equipment becomes reusable.

Name: infinite
Description: Too many dice.

Name: pierce
Description: Next attack ignores shield.

Name: curse
Description: All equipment has a 50% chance to fail.|Disappears once triggered.

Name: confuse
Description: Equipment is mixed-up and obscured this turn.

Name: shield
Description: Blocks incoming damage.

Name: survive
Description: Survive the next fatal blow.

Name: vampire
Description: Can only be killed with a wooden stake.

Name: lantern
Description: Stash some dice for next turn.

Name: illuminate
Description: Stash some dice for next turn.

Name: extraturn
Description: Take an extra turn.

Name: stash1
Description: Roll an extra 1 next turn.

Name: stash2
Description: Roll an extra 2 next turn.

Name: stash3
Description: Roll an extra 3 next turn.

Name: stash4
Description: Roll an extra 4 next turn.

Name: stash5
Description: Roll an extra 5 next turn.

Name: stash6
Description: Roll an extra 6 next turn.

Name: thorns
Description: Enemy takes [sword]<value> damage if they attack this turn.|(1 for each [thorns] thorn.)

Name: luck
Description: Items that depend on luck have a higher chance to succeed.

Name: luck+
Description: Items that depend on luck work 100% of the time.

Name: cpuprotect
Description: If you exceed the CPU target[;] reduce CPU by the excess.

Name: cpuvirus
Description: When you use equipment[;] increase CPU by <value>.

Name: cpushield
Description: The next roll won't exceed the CPU target.

Name: mana
Description: Mana is used to grant bonus powers on certain cards.|Disappears at the end of the fight.

Name: doublecast
Description: Place two copies of the next spell you cast.

Name: alternate_ice
Description: Reduce all dice values by <value>.

Name: alternate_ice_all
Description: Reduce all dice values by 1.

Name: alternate_fire
Description: Burning dice can be used on equipment[;] but will disable that|equipment for the rest of the turn[;] and for the next turn.

Name: alternate_fire_all
Description: Burning dice can be used on equipment[;] but will disable that|equipment for the rest of the turn[;] and for the next turn.

Name: alternate_shock
Description: Temporarily disables random equipment.|Costs [heart]3[] hp to unshock.

Name: alternate_weaken
Description: Take [sword]<value> extra damage from each attack.|([sword]1 per each point of weaken inflicted.)

Name: alternate_silence
Description: Limit break is less powerful.

Name: alternate_blind
Description: Cannot see remaining health.

Name: alternate_poison
Description: A random piece of equipment is poisoned. Reduce the|countdown to zero by the end of the turn[;] or take damage.

Name: alternate_fury
Description: The next equipment will be used twice[;] but|cannot be used next turn.

Name: alternate_curse
Description: All equipment has a 50% chance to switch target.|Disappears once triggered.

Name: alternate_confuse
Description: Cannot see the dice values.

Name: alternate_shield
Description: Restores [heart]<value> health at the start of your next turn.|([shield] disappears after healing.)

Name: alternate_dodge
Description: 50% chance to avoid the next attack[;] lasts until|something triggers it.

Name: alternate_reequipnext
Description: The next dice you use can be used again on this turn.

Name: alternate_reduce
Description: Block the next status effect.

Name: alternate_lock
Description: Locked dice need to be used in the order they are rolled[;]|before you can use any other dice.

Name: alternate_survive
Description: Cannot be killed by anything. Counter reduces by one on|each turn. If it reaches zero[;] you die.

Name: alternate_vampire
Description: Restore all health when defeated[;] once.

Name: alternate_thorns
Description: Restore [heal]<value> health with each attack this turn.|([heal]1 for each [thorns] thorn.)

Name: alternate_dice_trigger_1
Description: Roll an extra 1 next turn if the enemy rolls a 1.

Name: alternate_dice_trigger_2
Description: Roll an extra 2 next turn if the enemy rolls a 2.

Name: alternate_dice_trigger_3
Description: Roll an extra 3 next turn if the enemy rolls a 3.

Name: alternate_dice_trigger_4
Description: Roll an extra 4 next turn if the enemy rolls a 4.

Name: alternate_dice_trigger_5
Description: Roll an extra 5 next turn if the enemy rolls a 5.

Name: alternate_dice_trigger_6
Description: Roll an extra 6 next turn if the enemy rolls a 6.

Name: alternate_counter_1
Description: All enemy dice that roll 1 must be used first.

Name: alternate_counter_2
Description: All enemy dice that roll 2 must be used first.

Name: alternate_counter_3
Description: All enemy dice that roll 3 must be used first.

Name: alternate_counter_4
Description: All enemy dice that roll 4 must be used first.

Name: alternate_counter_5
Description: All enemy dice that roll 5 must be used first.

Name: alternate_counter_6
Description: All enemy dice that roll 6 must be used first.

Name: againstallodds
Description: Survive all fatal blows until your next turn.

Name: beartransform
Description: Counter reduces by one on each turn.|If it reaches zero[;] transform into a bear.

Name: extradamage
Description: Do [sword]<value> extra damage with each attack this turn.

Name: reflectexcess
Description: If defeated[;] reflect any excessive damage back at you.

Name: cannotseeenemyhealth
Description: (should not appear)

Name: vanish
Description: Duplicate dice are immediately destroyed.
Script: When inflicted: if(getstatusself(~ncr_vanish~) > 0) { trace(~removing stack vanish~); var tw = new motion.actuators.SimpleActuator(null|0.01|null); var s = new elements.Skill(~Against all odds_old~); s.script = ~  removestatusself(\~ncr_vanish\~|ALL); removestatusself(VANISH); inflictself(VANISH); ~; tw.onComplete(s.execute|[self|target]); tw.move(); } /*this won't cause an infinite 'when inflicted' loop because it needs ncr_vanish to be more than 0*/

Name: robotblinded
Description: (should not appear)

Description: (should not appear)

Description: Stash some dice for next turn.

Description: (should not appear)
